verses.name: Proverbs 16:12
verses.text: It is an abomination to kings to commit wickedness: for the throne is established by righteousness.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:13
verses.text: Righteous lips are the delight of kings; and they love him that speaketh right.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:14
verses.text: The wrath of a king is as messengers of death: but a wise man will pacify it.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:15
verses.text: In the light of the king’s countenance is life; and his favour is as a cloud of the latter rain.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:16
verses.text: How much better is it to get wisdom than gold! and to get understanding rather to be chosen than silver!
